Description:
Modern, Spacious, Quality Build.
Located in the small, elevated Circa estate adjacent to Berwick Waters, a meticulously presented, quality build with numerous upgrades. Welcomed by an attractive modern façade and flourishing landscape this property is perfect for the buyer searching for a home that is ready to move in and to be enjoyed. Downstairs boasts, study/sitting room, open plan living with atmospheric living flame remote controlled gas log fire and dining room, modern hostess kitchen detailed with stone benchtops, quality stainless steel appliances, boiling water tap, feature sliding barn door for pantry and an abundance of cupboard space. Additionally, a revamped laundry used for additional pantry space with all the upgrades including stone benchtop. Upstairs discover sleeping accommodation which consists of grand master suite with walk in robe and ensuite with double vanities, the perfect parents' retreat. Remaining two bedrooms generous in size offer built in robes and are serviced by stylish main bathroom.
Access through double sliding doors to a fabulous decked alfresco and covered pergola, surrounded by decorative woodwork, metal shutters to side of alfresco, sensational landscaping, hidden garden lighting and water feature, creating a private and tranquil zone.
Creature comforts include; remote controlled ceiling fans, ducted heating, air conditioning to family room/kitchen, plantation shutters to front and side plus venetians to remaining windows, aggregate to front and sides of the abode, higher spec insulation and additional ducted heating vents to both bathrooms.
Enjoy an award winning park and other amenities within proximity to Circa Estate, including prestigious schools, Eden Rise shopping centre, medical facilities, and so much more.
This much loved, well cared for opulent built home is ready for your inspection, enquire today and make it yours tomorrow!
Photo I.D required at all inspections.
